title: API compatibility for Azure Cosmos DB Garnet Cache
description: Below is the full list of API commands and their implementation status in Azure Cosmos DB Garnet Cache. There is compatibility with Redis clients and support for a subset of Redis data types and commands. The maximum size for a key value pair is 32MB. For the lowest latency, itâ€™s recommended to keep the size of a key value pair to around 1KB.
